title: The rare Super Moon is going to launch tidal waves and massive earthquakes.
subtitle: For decades, scientists have been discussing a relationship between lunar cycles and earthquakes, but no one has indicated that next week's great moon month will be a harbinger of chaos.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: According to scientists, the largest super moon since 1948, which occurred on 14 November 2016, will cause tidal waves and catastrophic earthquakes, causing devastation throughout the planet.
